summary: Completed frontend testing of mobile view features and Get Directions functionality. All tested features are working correctly - 100% pass rate.
passed_tests: Mobile view toggle in header - Monitor/Smartphone icons with switch visible on desktop (hidden sm:flex)
Mobile view toggle switch toggles body.mobile-view class correctly
Mobile view layout - sidebar moves from left to bottom navigation bar when enabled
Mobile view toggle correctly hidden in header on small screens (<640px)
Mobile view toggle accessible via user dropdown on small screens
Mobile view dropdown toggle works correctly on small screens
Mobile view state persists across page refresh
Get Directions button visible on Location tab for case WITH coordinates (52.802771, -1.635992)
Get Directions button correctly NOT shown for case WITHOUT coordinates
Get Directions opens Google Maps with correct URL format (https://www.google.com/maps/dir/?api=1&destination=52.802771,-1.635992)
Get Directions button styled with green background (bg-[#00703C]) and external link icon
Get Directions button hidden when in edit mode (as per code: hasLocation && !editMode)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile view features fully tested and working. Get Directions button tested on case e155f7db-0e81-4c1b-a43c-9005a042afe0 (has coords 52.802771, -1.635992) and case 50a07737-823f-4a49-b5e0-fe5fa6655025 (no coords). All localStorage persistence, toggle behavior, and Google Maps URL generation verified.
